title: i just got a 30 min ban for the gaming crashing in champ select
body: are u kidding me riot 30 mins because ur game had an error in champ select

replies.body:
A single disconnection won't land you a low-priority queue, in fact, it takes a trend of dodging or disconnecting from champ select before you'll see an LPQ. 

Crashes in champ select are mostly caused by your client dropping its connection to the matchmaking service. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings aren't being problematic.

Let me know if this issue pops up again.
